name: 王明展
objective:
•　　Objectives:
This course introduces the concepts, theories, and approaches of facilities planning. Topics discuss in class such as material handling, systematic layout planning, discrete layout problem, continuous layout problem, equal area layout problem, unequal area layout problem, heuristic method, storage system layout, and site selection are also included.
schedule:
•　　Schedule:
1. Introduction to Facilities Planning
2. Location
3. Systematic Layout Planning
4. The Layout Problem-Qualitative
5. The Layout Problem-Quantitative
6. Equal-Area Layout Problem
7. Unequal-Area Layout Problem
8. Computerized Layout Planning
9. Optimization
10. Storage System Layout
11. Other Topics
scorePolicy:
•　　Grade
Attendance 10%, Homework 15%, Mid exam. 25%, Final exam. 25% Final Project report 25%
